message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you.  I'm asking for $20,000 for it.  What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000.

I understand your budget concerns, Bob, but $12,000 is significantly less than what I'm willing to accept. This product offers incredible value, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
I'm still not sure if $17,000 is within my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. I really like the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my means.
